ingredients: 3 dried ancho peppers, stemmed and seeded
15 (6-inch) corn tortillas, each cut into 4 wedges
¼ cup queso fresco cheese (or feta cheese)
Garnish: chopped red onion, chopped avocado, sliced radishes, sour cream, lime, cilantro
